end.title: 恭喜你完成该向导.
end.message: 你可以重放此操作，或选择另一个教程。您还可以通过在平台界面中搜索教程图标来找到可用教程。.

tools_group.message: 您可以通过工具条访问或增加你喜欢的工具按钮.
tools_group.action: 点击按钮打开工具菜单.

workspaces_menu.title: 主菜单
workspaces_menu.message: 此菜单允许您在到桌面、应用程序首页或您的工作区内导航或浏览。.

administration_group.message: 管理菜单允许您访问所有可访问的管理工具。
administration_group.action: 点击按钮访问管理工具.

notifications.title: 消息中心
notifications.message: 消息中心将应用程序内部的所有消息进行重新分组（例如用户消息、通知）。
notifications.action: 点击按钮访问消息中心.

user_menu.title: 用户菜单
user_menu.message: 用户菜单使您可以访问个人工具、配置文件和偏好设置.
user_menu.action: 点击按钮打开用户菜单.

locale.message: 您可以通过此菜单随时更改应用程序的区域设置.

user_management.message: Permet de voir les utilisateurs et les groupes inscrits, de changer leurs droits ainsi que d'en inscrire de nouveaux.

sidebar.name: Discover the workspace sidebar
sidebar.description: Familiarize yourself with the features available in the workspace sidebar.

intro.title: Let's discover the workspace toolbar together !
intro.message: The toolbar will allow you to navigate inside the current workspace.

tools_group.message: The tools group permits to open the different enabled tools.

opened_tool.message: This is the currently opened tool.

actions_group.message: The actions group permits to manage and show information about the workspace.

analytics.message: Shows some analytics data of the workspace usage.

home.message: Permits to create an overview of the workspace.

logs.message: Shows the actions done by users in the workspace.

resource_manager.message: Permits to view and manage the resources of the workspace.

users.message: Permits to view the registered users and groups, changes their rights and register new ones.

actions.about: Shows general information about the workspace.
actions.delete: Permits to delete the workspace and all of its contents.
actions.impersonation: Permits to navigate inside the workspace with another role to see what those users see.
actions.walkthrough: Shows the list of available workspace tutorials.

editor.name: Discover the home configuration
editor.description: Familiarize yourself with the editor by browsing through its basic features.

intro.title: Welcome in the home configuration
intro.message: This editor allows you to configure all the parts of the home: tabs, sections and widgets.

tabs.title: The tabs
tabs.message: Home is composed of different tabs accessible through this menu.

opened_tab.message: This is the currently opened tab.

add_tab.message: Permits to add new tabs to the home.
add_tab.action: Click the button to add a new tab and continue this tutorial.

created_tab.message: After creation, the new tab is automatically opened.

tab_form.title: The configuration of the tab
tab_form.message: All of the options available for the tab are in this form (advanced configuration of tabs is explained in another tutorial).

tab_sections.title: The sections of the tab
tab_sections.message: Each tab can contain one or more sections that will organize and format the widgets. Since we just created this tab, there is no section at the moment.

add_section.message: We will now add a section to our tab.
add_section.action: Click the button to add a new section and continue this tutorial.

section_form.title: The configuration of the section
section_form.message: Before you can use it, you must choose the number and the size of columns to add to the section.

select_layout.message: The button shows the number and size of the columns which will be displayed.
select_layout.action: Click the button to create 3 columns section.

section_configure.message: All of the options available for the section are in this form.

section_save.message: Once you have finished to configure your section, you have to save your changes.
section_save.action: Click the button to add the new section to the tab.

created_section.message: This is the section you have created. You will be able to add 3 widgets in it later.

save.message: Remember to save your changes if you want them to be applied to the home.

exit.message: Or you can simply exit the editor if you don't want to keep your changes.

create-widget.name: Create a widget
create-widget.description: Learn how to add a new widget to an existing section.

add_widget.message: You can add a widget in any empty column of a section.
add_widget.info: For this tutorial we've added an empty section with one column for you to add a new widget.
add_widget.action: Click on the button to start the creation of a widget.

widget_type.title: The type of widget
widget_type.message: There are many widget types available based on the configuration of the application.

select_type.message: Before you can configure the widget, you need to choose its type.
select_type.action: Click on the button to create a widget %widgetType%.

save.message: Once you have finished configuring your widget, you have to save your changes.
save.action: Click on the button to add the new widget to the section.

created_widget.message: This is the widget you have just created. You will be able to modify it later.

create-widget-list.name: Create a widget: the List widget
create-widget-list.description: Learn how to add a new List widget.

intro.title: Welcome in the List widget creation
intro.message: The List widget allows you to display a list of data of your choice.

data_source.title: The source of data
data_source.message: For the List widget, there is an additional step before you can configure your widget: the choice of a data type to display in your list.

select_source.message: For this tutorial, we will create a list of resources.
select_source.action: Click on the button to create a list of resources.

list_form.title: The configuration of the list
list_form.message: All of the options available for the list are in this form (advanced configuration of list is explained in another tutorial).

list_display.message: The only require parameter is the view mode to use for the list.
list_display.action: Click on the button to open the configuration of view modes.

list_display_select.message: The field 'Default view mode' permits to choose the view mode which will be used by at loading.
list_display_select.action: Choose a view mode for your list.

create-widget-simple.name: Create a widget: the Content widget
create-widget-simple.description: Learn how to add a new Content widget.

intro.title: Welcome in the Content widget creation
intro.message: The Content widget allows you to create and style a rich content.

create_content.message: This editor allows you to modify the content displayed in the widget.

create-widget-resource.name: Create a widget: the Resource widget
create-widget-resource.description: Learn how to add a new Resource widget.

intro.title: Welcome in the Resource widget creation
intro.message: The Resource widget allows you to display the selected resource.

select_resource.message: This field permits to choose the resource to display.
select_resource.action: Click on the button to open the resource explorer.
